author: colen
msg: OPENNLP-500: Now the BaseToolFactory uses the ExtensionLoader to instantiate a ToolFactory. ToolFactories now need an empty constructor, and the constructor that takes an ArtifactProvider was replaced by a init method in the BaseToolFactory.
